description: Welcome to this charming 4 bedroom, 3 bathroom home located in the highly sought after neighborhood of Westwood Hills. neighborhood_description: Westwood Hills is known for its tree-lined streets, well-maintained homes, and sense of community. Residents enjoy easy access to top-rated schools, parks, shopping, and dining options. With its close proximity to major freeways, Westwood Hills offers a convenient commute to downtown and other parts of the city. This neighborhood is perfect for families and individuals looking for a quiet suburban setting with all the amenities of city living. Don't miss out on the opportunity to make this house your new home in Westwood Hills.

description: This stunning 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment in the heart of Greenwich Village is a rare find.
